mapper.insert: INSERT INTO connstat SELECT SYSDATE AS connstat_date, COUNT(*) AS connstat_visiters, COUNT(CASE conn_ref WHEN 'Email' THEN 1 END) AS referer_email, COUNT(CASE conn_ref WHEN 'Blog' THEN 1 END) AS referer_blog, COUNT(CASE conn_ref WHEN 'SNS' THEN 1 END) AS referer_sns, COUNT(CASE conn_ref WHEN 'Other' THEN 1 END) AS referer_others, COUNT(CASE conn_divice WHEN 'Mobile' THEN 1 END) AS divice_mobile, COUNT(CASE conn_divice WHEN 'Tablet' THEN 1 END) AS divice_tablet, COUNT(CASE conn_divice WHEN 'PC' THEN 1 END) AS divice_pc, COUNT(CASE conn_divice WHEN 'Other' THEN 1 END) AS divice_others, COUNT(CASE conn_browser WHEN 'FireFox' THEN 1 END) AS brow_firefox, COUNT(CASE conn_browser WHEN 'MISE' THEN 1 END) AS brow_mise, COUNT(CASE conn_browser WHEN 'Chrome' THEN 1 END) AS brow_chrome, COUNT(CASE conn_browser WHEN 'Opera' THEN 1 END) AS brow_opera, COUNT(CASE conn_browser WHEN 'Other' THEN 1 END) AS brow_others, COUNT(CASE conn_os WHEN 'Android' THEN 1 END) AS os_android, COUNT(CASE conn_os WHEN 'iOS' THEN 1 END) AS os_ios, COUNT(CASE conn_os WHEN 'Windows 10' THEN 1 END) AS os_windows10, COUNT(CASE conn_os WHEN 'Windows XP' THEN 1 END) AS os_windowsxp, COUNT(CASE conn_os WHEN 'Windows' THEN 1 END) AS os_windowsothers, COUNT(CASE conn_os WHEN 'Linux' THEN 1 END) AS os_linux, COUNT(CASE conn_os WHEN 'Macintosh' THEN 1 END) AS os_mecintosh, COUNT(CASE conn_os WHEN 'Other' THEN 1 END) AS os_others FROM conninformation WHERE conn_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'yyyy.MM.dd'), 'yyyy.MM.dd') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'yyyy.MM.dd') || '23:59:59', 'yyyy.MM.dd HH24:MI:SS')

INSERT INTO conntimestat SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy.MM.dd HH24'), 'yyyy.MM.dd HH24:MI:SS') AS timestat_date, COUNT(CASE TO_CHAR(conn_time, 'yyyy.MM.dd HH24') WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy.MM.dd HH24') THEN 1 END) AS timestat_count FROM conninformation c GROUP BY SYSDATE-1
